H0.text: The prominent headland known as the Great Orme is close to which Welsh town. Conwy

H1.text: The prominent headland known as the Great Orme is close to which Welsh town. Colwyn Bay

H2.text: The prominent headland known as the Great Orme is close to which Welsh town. Rhyl

H3.text: The prominent headland known as the Great Orme is close to which Welsh town. LLANDUDNO

A4.text: north-west of the town of Llandudno

A5.text: The Great Orme is home to wild Kashmiri goats that frequently roam the main streets of Llandudno.

A6.text: The Great Orme Tramway runs from the centre of the town to the summit of the Great Orme.
